mng: denote a sound or sharp noise (gunfire etc)

exm.mng: denote a sound or sharp noise (gunfire etc)
horn (automobile etc), loudspeaker, brass wind instrument, trumpet, suona 鎖吶|锁呐[suo3 na4]
(lit.) blowing the trumpet, (fig.) to praise sb, (slang) to give a blowjob
Om Mani Padma Hum (sanskrit), or Om mani padme hum (Tibetan), the Avalokiteshvara mantra
exm.pyn: ǎn ma ní bā mī mōu

exm.mng: Om Mani Padma Hum (sanskrit), or Om mani padme hum (Tibetan), the Avalokiteshvara mantra, also written 唵嘛呢叭咪哞 唵嘛呢叭咪哞
exm.pyn: ǎn ma mī ba ní mōu

exm.mng: Om Mani Padme Hum (Sanskrit), or Om Mani Peme Hung (Tibetan), the Avalokiteshvara mantra
exm.pyn: ǎn ma ní bā mī hōng
